AudioWorkletProcessorPort.summary:
The read-only port property of the
interface returns the associated
. It can be used to communicate between the processor and the
to which it belongs.

blockquote.para:
Note: The port at the other end of the channel is
available under the property of the node.

remarks.para:
-Web Audio API
-Using the Web Audio API

AudioWorkletProcessorPort.value: The object that is connecting the AudioWorkletProcessor and the associated AudioWorkletNode.
